idea-plugin.name: Python Community Edition
idea-plugin.description:
The Python plug-in provides smart editing for Python scripts. The feature set of the plugin corresponds to PyCharm IDE Community Edition.
PyCharm blog
Discussion forum
Issue tracker

registryKey.description: Use bare python instead of conda run for conda
Use dispatcher in Python debugger
Flask Server Run configurations new UI
PyTest configurations new UI
Python test autodetect configuration new UI
Run doctest via pytest configuration
Possibility to create namespace packages from New | Python Package
Possibility to write await outside of function
Enables an experimental low impact monitoring API for Python 3.12
Enables the Python debugger Cython speed-ups
Enables the Python debugger diagnostic prints
Halt variable resolve threads on step/resume
Use a single port for communication between PyCharm and the debugger
Specifies default acceptable number of dots in a relative import statement
Switches Python support to Targets API.
Enables Conda configuration on targets.
Use project location as a working directory for the packaging tool execution.
Upload project files and use this location as a working directory for the packaging tool execution.
Python Run configurations new UI
Enable Black formatter support
Show type hints for all parameters in parameter info window
Use the same UI to configure interpreters in IDE widget and New Project Wizard

action.description: Forcibly update all configured Python SDKs in the project
